pages.text: The powers resting inside $(thing)Soul Alloy Tools$() are formidable. Whether innate like the $(l:conjuring:soul_alloy_tools/soul_alloy_hatchet)Soul Alloy Hatchet$()'s $(thing)Soul Feller$() ability or additive like the $(thing)area-mining$() of a scope-augmented $(l:conjuring:soul_alloy_tools/soul_alloy_pickaxe)Soul Alloy Pickaxe$(), they can also be quite destructive. To ensure one's property stays intact, the tools normally rest in a disabled state, ready to be awoken by their master.
To accomplish this, it is required to press both the $(thing)Shift$() and $(thing)$(k:conjuring.toggle_tool_mode)$() (configurable) keys while holding the tool.
